body:
Comment 1 by **sadasant**: 
As commented by remy_o in #go-nuts, -0.6400000000000001i is the product of rounding,
which is not itself an issue, I can handle that. But the negative zero in the real part
can be confirmed here: http://play.golang.org/p/CticRlgZj2 (is the same code, I'm just
printing the real part at the end).

Notes on the code: I'm using Val as interface{} to reduce writing (sorry), and I'm using
interfaces because in the real code I'm working with more than complex values.

Please tell me if you need more details or if there's something I can do.
